name: emi.unicore-gateway
description: The Gateway is the entry point into a UNICORE site. It is installed in front of any networking firewall. It authenticates incoming messages and forwards them to their intended destination. The gateway receives the reply and sends it back to the client.
releaseNotes:
What's new

    * At server startup verification of all keystore and truststore settings is performed to detect missing files, wrong passwords etc.

    * Gateway reuses some of the securityLibrary functions.



Deployment notes

    * NONE - this is an initial RPM release



Known issues

    * None
changeLog: Put the Change logs here (multiline field)
